title: Kim Kardashian’s BFF Jonathan Cheban legally changes name to Foodgod
text:
Meet Foodgod (Picture: Astrid Stawiarz/Getty)

Jonathan Cheban has legally changed his name to Foodgod and we’re just as confused as you are.

The TV personality, who rose to fame through his work with bestie Kim Kardashian, presents a podcast and had a TV show with the name Foodgod, as well as using the nickname as his Instagram username.

However, never one to pass up on a branding opportunity, Jonathan has taken things one (or 20) steps further and according to legal documents seen by TMZ has officially changed his name to Foodgod.

The 45-year-old Celebs Go Dating star has also put a registered trademark symbol by his name on Instagram, which could mean that Foodgod is going global.

We do have to admit, we can’t really imagine Kim Kardashian referring to her long time bestie by this new name.

Jonathan’s pal Gemma Collins, on the other hand? We can somehow see it…

Back in January, Jonathan spoke to Metro.co.uk about his planned name change, but explained that the process had not been an easy one.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I’m in the process of legally changing it and it’s in the works with the lawyers, there’s so much stuff that has to be done – it’s not an easy process,’ he said.

Reflecting on becoming his alter ego, he continued: ‘When people call me Jonathan it’s almost weird at this point because in America, it’s Foodgod all the time.

‘After somebody says it once, they can’t stop saying it. It’s like a thing. If you look there’s Puff Daddy and you think – wait, that is your name. Foodgod… it’s one word so it’s easy.’

Whatever floats your boat, erm, Foodgod.

description: Jonathan Cheban has legally changed his name to Foodgod and we’re just as confused as you are.
